finding_info.title: Hardware MFA is not enabled for the root account
finding_info.desc: The root account does not have a hardware MFA device enabled. Hardware MFA provides an extra layer of protection on top of a username and password.

remediation.description: Enable a hardware MFA device for the root account. Go to IAM console → Dashboard → Activate MFA on your root account.

finding_info.title: S3 bucket customer-data-prod has public access enabled
finding_info.desc: The S3 bucket allows public access which could expose sensitive data.

remediation.description: Enable S3 Block Public Access at the bucket level. Go to S3 → customer-data-prod → Permissions → Block public access → Enable all four settings.

finding_info.title: Security group sg-0abc123 allows unrestricted SSH access (0.0.0.0/0:22)
finding_info.desc: Security group allows inbound SSH from any IP address.

remediation.description: Restrict SSH access to known IP ranges. Go to EC2 → Security Groups → sg-0abc123 → Edit inbound rules → Replace 0.0.0.0/0 with your office CIDR.

finding_info.title: RDS instance prod-db-01 does not have encryption at rest enabled
finding_info.desc: The RDS database instance is not encrypted at rest, which means data stored on disk is not protected.

remediation.description: Enable encryption at rest for the RDS instance. Note: You cannot enable encryption on an existing unencrypted instance. Create an encrypted snapshot and restore from it.

finding_info.title: IAM user deploy-bot has access key older than 90 days
finding_info.desc: Access keys should be rotated within 90 days to reduce risk of compromised credentials.

remediation.description: Rotate the access key for user deploy-bot. Create a new key, update all services using the old key, then delete the old key.

finding_info.title: CloudTrail is not configured for multi-region logging
finding_info.desc: CloudTrail should log events from all regions to detect activity in unused regions.

remediation.description: Update the CloudTrail trail to enable multi-region logging. Go to CloudTrail → Trails → management-trail → Edit → Enable 'Apply trail to all regions'.

finding_info.title: KMS key alias/app-encryption does not have automatic rotation enabled
finding_info.desc: KMS customer managed keys should have automatic annual rotation enabled.

remediation.description: Enable automatic key rotation. Go to KMS → Customer managed keys → alias/app-encryption → Key rotation → Enable.

finding_info.title: VPC flow logs are enabled for vpc-main
finding_info.desc: VPC Flow Logs capture information about IP traffic going to and from network interfaces in a VPC.

finding_info.title: IAM password policy requires minimum 14 characters
finding_info.desc: Password policy meets the minimum length requirement.

finding_info.title: MFA is enabled for the root account
finding_info.desc: Root account has MFA enabled which provides additional security.
